::Dachande::

    He reached up and pulled Battera down. "Hi," He said. "We=
 are helping Kit Kat and Destructor."
    He powered up his shoulder cannon=
 and shot a blast at Ares. Then he jumps from his tree to another. "Battera=
, you might want to move."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: logomorp=
h@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, November 19, 2000 =
10:16 AM
  Subject: Re: They reach Kit Kat's posistion


  Battera::
  She =
flew in close to CyberShark. "Who are we supposed to be helping 
  here?"

=

  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
  > ::Mag=
matron/Cerberus/Dachande/Jynx/Obitus/AEger/
  > Fame/Bellum/Neamen Hydra/Ec=
lipse/Wolveritron::
  > 
  > Magmatron and Cerberus were ready to go, they =
had weapon systems on 
  and guns aimed, but they did not fire. They watche=
d as vollys were 
  being fired.
  > 
  > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~
  > Jynx and the Four Nightmares opened fire on The Oblitercons.=
 They 
  fire one shot each at them and turn to look at Magmatron and 
  Ce=
rberus, their leaders. They weren't firing so Jynx and the 
  Nightmares st=
opped.
  > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  > Neamen Hydra wen=
t to Hydra mode and went into a frenzy, she shot at 
  The Oblitercons, Dea=
mon Wulf, Dark Claw, Flesh Ripper, Six Shot, 
  Ares, Manterror, Injector, =
BumbleBee, Double Punch, and Unitron. Then 
  he falls to the ground, tired=
 from his frenzy. He crawls away from 
  the battle.
  > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  > Eclipse and Wolveritron didn't know who to fi=
re at so they watched 
  to see who fired at the ones they came here with.
=
  > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  > Dachande, in robot mode=
, climbed a tree, there he cloaked and 
  targeted Alliance members. Using =
his shoulder cannon he shot at 
  BumbleBee and then at Injector. He pulled=
 out his spear gun and fired 
  at Double Punch and Unitron. His cloak drop=
ped because of the gun but 
  he sat up in the tree, still pretty much unab=
le to be seen by the 
  naked optic and waited for another great hunting op=
portunty.


        eGroups Sponsor
